package.name: restler/framework
package.description: Just the Restler Framework without the tests and examples

3.x-dev.name: restler/framework
3.x-dev.description: Just the Restler Framework without the tests and examples

suggest.rodneyrehm\/plist: If you need Apple plist binary/xml format
suggest.twig\/twig: If you want to use twig templates with Html format
suggest.mustache\/mustache: If you want to use mustache/handlebar templates with Html format
suggest.illuminate\/view: If you want to use laravel blade templates with Html format
suggest.bshaffer\/oauth2-server-php: If you want to use OAuth2 for authentication

dev-master.name: restler/framework
dev-master.description: Just the Restler Framework without the tests and examples

suggest.luracast\/explorer: Restler's very own api explorer (see require-dev for details)
suggest.rodneyrehm\/plist: Restler supports tho Apple plist xml format (see require-dev for details)
suggest.zendframework\/zendamf: Support for the amf document format  (see require-dev for details)
suggest.symfony\/yaml: Restler can produce content in yaml format as well (see require-dev for details)
suggest.twig\/twig: Restler can render HtmlView using twig templates (see require-dev for details)
suggest.mustache\/mustache: Restler can render HtmlView using mustache/handlebar templates (see require-dev for details)
suggest.bshaffer\/oauth2-server-php: Restler can provide OAuth2 authentication using this library (see require-dev for details)
